message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.AI. 

The paper presents a new deep point cloud rendering pipeline that uses a neural network to generate images from a point cloud. This involves projecting features into a layered volume of camera frustum and using a 3D CNN to produce multiple layers of images. The paper is likely to belong to the Computer Vision (cs.CV) category as it deals with image generation and rendering. It may also belong to the Graphics (cs.GR) category as it involves rendering 3D scenes. The use of a neural network suggests that it may also belong to the Machine Learning (cs.LG) category. The paper also deals with camera trajectories and visibility, which suggests that it may belong to the Robotics (cs.RO) category. Finally, the paper involves learning weights to blend the layered images, which suggests that it may also belong to the Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) category.
